script_text: Aries, today marks a powerful shift in your energy! Mars aligns with Jupiter, bringing a surge of confidence that you simply cannot ignore. Watch out for a surprise conversation around 2 PM that could change your career trajectory. In love, be bold—someone is waiting for your move. Lucky number: 5. Color: Red.
title: Aries Daily Prediction - Powerful Energy Shift! ♈

script_text: Taurus, stability is your superpower today. The moon in your sign harmonizes with Venus, creating a perfect atmosphere for romance and financial planning. Don't rush into decisions; take your time. A small investment now will pay off huge later. Lucky number: 2. Color: Green.
title: Taurus Daily Prediction - Financial Harmony! ♉

script_text: Gemini, your communication skills are on fire! Mercury boosts your wit, making you the star of any social gathering. However, avoid gossiping as it might backfire. A short trip or a new learning opportunity is on the horizon. Lucky number: 7. Color: Yellow.
title: Gemini Daily Prediction - Social Star! ♊
